law.text: The Uniform Commercial Code being a general act intended as a unified coverage of its subject matter, no part of it shall be deemed to be impliedly repealed by subsequent legislation if such construction can reasonably be avoided.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 242, sec. 4, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 1-104, effective July 1, 1960.
